title: The Hugo Winners, Volume 4: Thirteen Prizewinning Stories 1976 - 1979
description: This collection features nine prize-winning science fiction stories for the years 1980-1982 by Barry B. Longyear, Gordon R. Dickson, Clifford D. Simak, Poul Anderson, Roger Zelazny, John Varley, and George R.R. Martin
author: Isaac Asimov
